Title: Object: Holy Family
Series: Stafford Gallery
Description: Plate 7: the rest on the flight into Egypt, with in the right foreground the seated Virgin leaning on a sarcophagus with Christ Child in her lap, behind her an adoring angel, before her a cherub bringing some flowers to Christ, and on the left an angel descending from Heaven. c.1815 Etching; image cut and pasted onto sheet bearing inscriptions
Producer name: After: Francesco Albani (attributed on plate to)
Curator's comments: From 'Engravings of the Most Noble the Marquis of Stafford's Collection...', see 1860,0211.552 for comment. Composition attributed on plate to Albani; however there is no corresponding picture in C. Puglesi, 'Francesco Albani', London and New Haven, 1999
